Class ExportedPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • ExportedPlatform

  • public class ExportedPlatform
extends java.lang.Object
    Unzips an exported platform module file and puts it in a folder named 'PlatModX'. Also has methods to backup local git directory and strip unwanted $ signs from files and folders
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Reynolds
